feedback:
Limited DRIVER framework demonstration. Focus on these missing stages: E, I, V, R, R2.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Financial Concepts Accuracy: There is no discussion or calculation of NPV, nor any conceptual explanation of present value of future cash flows minus initial investment. The sole content relates to subtitles and provides no evidence toward the criterion, so under the moderate standard this results in a fail.
- Financial Concepts Accuracy: There is no discussion or demonstration of the NPV decision rule (accept if NPV > 0, reject if NPV < 0), nor any examples or applications. The only content indicates a subtitle issue, providing no conceptual coverage, so the criterion fails.
- Financial Concepts Accuracy: There is no discussion, explanation, or calculation related to IRR or NPV in the submission. Even under a moderate standard allowing conceptual discussion, the transcript provides no relevant content, so the criterion is not demonstrated.

criteria.criterion_name: Net Present Value (NPV): Calculating present value of future cash flows minus initial investment
criteria.driver_alignment: Only DISCOVER stage is present, noting a tooling issue. No DEFINE, INVESTIGATE, VERIFY, or EXECUTE steps addressing NPV concepts, calculations, or discussion.
criteria.reasoning: There is no discussion or calculation of NPV, nor any conceptual explanation of present value of future cash flows minus initial investment. The sole content relates to subtitles and provides no evidence toward the criterion, so under the moderate standard this results in a fail.

criteria.driver_alignment: Only the Discover stage is evident, noting a technical barrier; no stages address NPV decision rule understanding.
criteria.reasoning: There is no discussion or demonstration of the NPV decision rule (accept if NPV > 0, reject if NPV < 0), nor any examples or applications. The only content indicates a subtitle issue, providing no conceptual coverage, so the criterion fails.

criteria.driver_alignment: Only the Discover stage is evidenced (reporting a barrier). No stages demonstrate understanding, discussion, or application of IRR.

criteria.driver_alignment: Only the DISCOVER stage is present (the single line about YouTube subtitles). There is no explicit DEFINE stage content (no problem statement, no decision criteria, no flowchart/planning) or other DRIVER stages demonstrated.
